TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Queryable extends System.Object
public ref class Queryable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 方法，用於查詢實作 的資料結構。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的一組方法宣告查詢的資料來源實作類別提供的標準查詢運算子實作。The set of methods declared in the class provides an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 標準查詢運算子會遵循的一般用途方法[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，並讓您透過任何表示周遊、 篩選和投射作業。以.NET 為基礎的程式設計語言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 此類別中方法大多會定義為延伸的延伸模組方法型別。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the type. 這表示它們可以實作任何物件上呼叫和執行個體方法一樣。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 這些方法來擴充不會執行任何直接查詢。These methods that extend do not perform any querying directly. 相反地，其功能是建置物件，即表示累計查詢的運算式樹狀架構。Instead, their functionality is to build an object, which is an expression tree that represents the cumulative query. 方法接著會將新的運算式樹狀架構傳遞給其中一個方法或方法的輸入。The methods then pass the new expression tree to either the method or the method of the input . 呼叫的方法取決於是否方法會傳回單一值，在此情況下呼叫時，或可列舉結果，在此情況下呼叫。The method that is called depends on whether the method returns a singleton value, in which case is called, or has enumerable results, in which case is called. 目標資料上執行實際的查詢藉由實作類別。The actual query execution on the target data is performed by a class that implements . 任何預期實作是執行運算式樹狀架構所建構的結果標準查詢運算子方法就相當於呼叫對應方法的結果類別，如果資料來源是。The expectation of any implementation is that the result of executing an expression tree that was constructed by a standard query operator method is equivalent to the result of calling the corresponding method in the class, if the data source were an . 除了運作的標準查詢運算子方法物件，這個類別也包含一個方法中， ，哪一個型別物件做為物件。In addition to the standard query operator methods that operate on objects, this class also contains a method, , which types objects as objects.

span.span: Language-Integrated Query (LINQ)
Standard Query Operators Overview
Expression Trees
LINQ to SQL

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有至少一個參數的型別的類型引數是其中一個型別。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 針對這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，將會編譯為。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`source`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 預期的行為是指定的函式， `func`，套用至每個來源序列和累積的值會傳回值。The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned. 中的第一個值`source`作為累積的值，對應中的第一個參數的初始值`func`。The first value in `source` is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`. 若要簡化常見的彙總作業，一組標準查詢運算子，也包含兩個計數的方法：並，和四個數值彙總方法，也就是， ， ，和.To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, and , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建置一個句子，從字串的陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use to build a sentence from an array of strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`source`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 預期的行為是，它會傳回第一個元素`source`，或預設值，如果`source`是空的。The expected behavior is that it returns the first element in `source`, or a default value if `source` is empty. 方法不會提供方法來指定要傳回的預設值`source`是空的。The method does not provide a way to specify the default value to return if `source` is empty. 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用範例 > 一節中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用空序列上。The following code example demonstrates how to use on an empty sequence. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Queryable#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/CS/queryable.cs#37)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Queryable#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/VB/queryable.vb#37)] 有時值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 除了檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並將它如有必要變更，您可以使用方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然後，呼叫取得第一個項目。Then, call to obtain the first element. 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值為 1，如果數字月份的集合是空的。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric months is empty. 整數，預設值為 0，這未對應至任何月份，因為預設值必須被指定為 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查詢完成後，便會檢查第一次的結果變數，不必要的預設值。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query is completed. 第二個結果變數藉由呼叫取得指定預設值為 1。The second result variable is obtained by calling to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有至少一個參數的型別的類型引數是其中一個型別。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 針對這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，將會編譯為。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`outer`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `outer` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`outer`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter. 預期的行為是，`outerKeySelector`並`innerKeySelector`函數用來擷取索引鍵`outer`和`inner`分別。The expected behavior is that the `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively. 這些金鑰會比較比對中的每個項目是否相等`outer`的零或多個項目和`inner`。These keys are compared for equality to match each element in `outer` with zero or more elements from `inner`. 則`resultSelector`函式會叫用投影的結果物件，從每個群組的相互關聯的項目。Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each group of correlated elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上兩個序列執行群組的聯結。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a grouped join on two sequences. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有至少一個參數的型別的類型引數是其中一個型別。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 針對這些參數，您可以傳遞 lambda 運算式中，將會編譯為。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`outer`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `outer` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`outer`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter. 預期的行為是，`outerKeySelector`並`innerKeySelector`函數用來擷取索引鍵`outer`和`inner`分別。The expected behavior is that the `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively. 這些金鑰會使用比較是否相等`comparer`。These keys are compared for equality by using `comparer`. 比較的結果用來比對中的每個項目`outer`的零或多個項目和`inner`。The outcome of the comparisons is used to match each element in `outer` with zero or more elements from `inner`. 則`resultSelector`函式會叫用投影的結果物件，從每個群組的相互關聯的項目。Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each group of correlated elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 因執行運算式樹狀架構表示呼叫的查詢行為之型別的實作而定`source`參數。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 預期的行為是，它會傳回最後一個元素`source`，或預設值，如果`source`是空的。The expected behavior is that it returns the last element in `source`, or a default value if `source` is empty. 方法不會提供方法來指定預設值。The method does not provide a way to specify a default value. 如果您想要指定預設值以外`default(TSource)`，使用範例 > 一節中所述的方法。If you want to specify a default value other than `default(TSource)`, use the method as described in the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上的空陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use on an empty array. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Queryable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/CS/queryable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Queryable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/VB/queryable.vb#45)] 有時值`default(TSource)`不是您想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的預設值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 除了檢查不必要的預設值的結果，並將它如有必要變更，您可以使用方法，以指定您想要使用這個集合是空的預設值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然後，呼叫取得最後一個項目。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下列程式碼範例會使用這兩種技術以取得預設值為 1，如果數字的每月天數的集合是空的。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 整數，預設值為 0，這未對應到任何一天的月份，因為預設值必須被指定為 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查詢完成後，便會檢查第一次的結果變數，不必要的預設值。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query is completed. 第二個結果變數藉由呼叫取得指定預設值為 1。The second result variable is obtained by calling to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生，表示呼叫本身做為建構的泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 它接著會傳遞要方法由屬性`source1`參數。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source1` parameter. 方法會將合併的第一個序列的每個項目，與第二個序列中具有相同索引的項目。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列沒有相同數目的項目，方法，直到它到達結尾的其中一個，就會合併序列。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一個序列具有三個項目，另一個有四個產生的序列必須只有三個項目。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the resulting sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來合併兩個序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences.
